snippet: As the published evidence for the source of chronic fatigue syndrome fell apart, a legal melodrama erupted, dismaying and demoralizing patients and many members of the scientific community.
abstract: Breakthrough 2009 study linking chronic fatigue syndrome to a little-known retrovirus has been officially discredited after a string of subsequent studies failed to confirm it, amounting to one of the most dramatic scientific reversals in recent years; lead researcher Dr Judy Mikovits is attempting to replicate her results despite the controversy, and patients who suffer from CFS say they welcome the publicity that the case has brought to their disease.
lead_paragraph: As the published evidence for the source of chronic fatigue syndrome fell apart, a legal melodrama erupted, dismaying and demoralizing patients and many members of the scientific community.

headline.seo: Fallout From Chronic Fatigue Syndrome Retraction Is Far and Wide
headline.main: Fallout From Fatigue Syndrome Retraction Is Wide
headline.print_headline: Fallout From Fatigue Syndrome Retraction Is Wide
